ticket.title: Creating new project - 'hash': bignum too big to convert into long
ticket.original-body:
I just followed these steps to install Rails 3 beta:
sudo gem install tzinfo builder memcache-client rack rack-test rack-mount erubis mail text-format thor bundler i18n sudo gem install rails --pre
Then issued the following command:
rails myproject --edge --database=mysql

ticket.original-body-html:
I just followed these steps to install Rails 3 beta:

sudo gem install tzinfo builder memcache-client rack rack-test rack-mount erubis mail text-format thor bundler i18n
sudo gem install rails --pre

Then issued the following command:

rails myproject --edge --database=mysql
